141.heading: National Periodical Publications--Miscellanea.
141.title: "Bloc-Notes-USA Septembre 69"
141.author: par Claude Moliterni
notes: Report on a meeting of the National Cartoonists Society, with photographs of Burne Hogarth, David Pascal, Claude Moliterni, Al Smith, Jeanine Moliterni, Alfred Andriola, Rube Goldberg, Schneider, Bob Dunn, Dick Hodgins Jr. Leonard Starr, Sylvan Byck, and Milton Caniff. Includes photographs of the archives of National Periodical Publications.

142.heading: National Periodical Publications--Miscellanea.
142.title: "The Comic Books"
142.author: by Joe Brancatelli
notes: About the end of Charlton Comics and the Gold Key imprint, with speculation about the future of National Periodical Publications and Marvel Comics.

143.heading: National Periodical Publications--Miscellanea.
143.title: "Fawcett vs. DC"
143.author: Mark Turley
143.appears_in: p. 50 in Comic Book Marketplace, no. 20 (Dec. 1992).
notes: Letter to the editor about the lawsuit between National Periodical Publications and Fawcett Publications in the late 1940s and early 1950s.

American comics publisher, earlier called
  • National Comics Publications
